data.title: Santosh Shukla
data.meta_description:
Entrepreneur with strong Product Management and User Experience insights. Led successful product portfolios in Customer Intelligence and E-Commerce landscape. Building great Product Experiences is Santosh's passion.

Specialities: Organization Leadership, Ideation, Requirement Definition, Product Roadmap, Market & Business Analysis, End User Focus, Excellent +ve Attitude, Adaptable to Change, Eye for Detail, User Experience, Penchant for Quality...

Agile Enthusiast and practitioner.
